reviews.title: Amazing value -highly recommended
reviews.text: Last minute booking via a travel agent came up with the Inter City Hotel. Amazing value - not much more tham a superior hostel price for two. We saved so much money by using the free transport card in Berlin, Potsdam and to the airport.
Very clean, comfortable and polite service.
reviews.title: An excellent hotel and location in East Berlin

reviews.text: I booked via Hotwire, and they didnt deceive me, I paid 38 euros per night which included a twin room plus daily travelcard for 2 people (worth 6 euros each) which means that the room was only 26 euros, and for that price, it was amazing value, very clean hotel and room, although the beds were very small.
reviews.title: Such an amazing bargain!

reviews.text: The situation is right inside the Ostbanhof, with links to everywhere in the city so easily, it has also a lot of nice shops, that were open at 6am on sunday such as Mcdo, library, kebbab, dunkin donuts...
reviews.title: free travel card!!

reviews.text: Would definitively recommend it if you get a good price, the mini bar was also well price (2.50 euros for a beer) although phone calls were very expensive (around 3 euros for 2 minutes).
reviews.title: Great hotel to start your European vacation

reviews.text: Stayed mid week at this hotel. Really clean and modern, very comfortable. The best thing was the free travel card, no messing about with ticket machines, just jump on the train and if you change your mind or get lost just jump off and go somewhere else! It was valid all the way out to Oranienburg for the Sachsenhausen concentration camp, about an hour away. Could only hear the station announcements if the window was open, we were on the station side too. Great location for getting around Berlin. East side gallery opposite hotel. For breakfast we just used the food hall at the station, really good value. Great hotel.
reviews.title: Earplugs are your only problem

reviews.text: We discovered this hotel by accident when we were unable to make our train to Prague and had to overnight in Berlin. This hotel is located right next to the Ostbahnoff train station in Berlin and is good if you are passing through or wish to stay in Berlin. For 100 euros per night (incl. Breakfast – rate in early OCT 2005), this hotel is a great deal for the value. This rate also includes a free pass on Berlin’s public transport system, which is good until midnight the day you check out.
reviews.title: Great Situation, Good Staff, Super Price
